description: Christmas can be very difficult time for people who have no idea how to handle their money properly. This boy was a prime example. He decided that a new TV was more important than the rent. And he didn’t even pay for the TV. Without my help he would had ended up on the street pretty soon. Of course I was willing to help him. I was incredibly horny after Christmas holidays. It’s always fun to “help” all those fools who can’t handle the financial situation they got into during Christmas. The poor boy was a little scared but he realized that I was his only help. So in the end, he gave up his ass virginity. I tried to be gentle but it wasn’t easy. I had to remind myself constantly that I was helping the poor boy. Life lessons are never learned easily.
title: Debt Dandy 224
